title.narrative: Ha Noi Metro Rail System Project (Line 3: Nhon-Ha Noi Station Section) - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The project will develop a 12.5 kilometer (km) dual-track rail line between the suburb of Nhon and the main railway station of Viet Nam's capital city, Ha Noi, 3.5 km underground, 8.5 km elevated, and 0.5 km on a transition ramp. The project works include a depot with ancillary buildings at Nhon, elevated viaducts, a transition tunnel portal, bored tunnels, and 12 stations. The project will provide electrical and mechanical systems, including all railway systems required to operate a modern metro line. The project also includes support for detailed design, procurement, construction supervision, design verification, project management, and capacity development.
